record.title: ORDER FOR AUTHORITY TO SIGN ENROLLED BILLS AND JOINT RESOLUTIONS
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR AUTHORITY TO SIGN ENROLLED BILLS AND JOINT RESOLUTIONS -- (Senate - April 30, 2008)

[Page: S3646]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that during the adjournment of the Senate, the majority leader be authorized to sign duly enrolled bills or joint resolutions.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
